company.support: Need help? Visit our support page.

hero.title: Choose Your Plan
hero.description: Simple, transparent pricing for businesses of all sizes. Start warming up your domains and sending campaigns today.

business.title: Business
business.description: Ideal for growing businesses starting with email outreach.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For established businesses scaling their outreach efforts.

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Tailored solutions for large enterprises or specific needs.

items.question: Is there a free tier or trial?
items.answer: We do not offer a free tier, but we do have a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied, contact us within 30 days, and we will refund your payment.

items.question: I don't like some part of the plan or have suggestions.
items.answer: We'd love to hear from you! Please email us at feedback@penguinmails.com with your suggestions. If we implement your suggestion, we'll give you a lifetime discount on your plan.

contact_form.title: Contact Support
contact_form.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is here to help.
contact_form.success_message: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you shortly.

campaigns.title: Getting Started with Cold Email Campaigns
campaigns.description: Learn how to create your first cold email campaign from setup to launch.

deliverability.title: Improving Email Deliverability
deliverability.description: Strategies to ensure your emails land in the inbox, not the spam folder.

templates.title: Crafting Effective Email Templates
templates.description: Tips and strategies for writing compelling cold emails that get responses.

lead_management.title: Managing Lead Lists and Imports
lead_management.description: How to import, organize, and manage your lead lists for maximum campaign effectiveness.

header.title: Help & Support
header.subtitle: Welcome to our support center. Find articles, tutorials, and contact our team.

getting_started.title: Quick Start Guide
getting_started.description: A complete walkthrough of our platform's key features.

domain_setup.description: How to set up domains and create mailboxes for sending.

warmup_process.title: Warmup Process Explained

header.description: Join PenguinMails to start sending successful campaigns.
